title: Päkapikumatk (Elf Hike) — Pirita River Valley — Morning Session

price.note: Listed as täispilet 20 € on organizer site

interestFit: Guided winter nature walk in Tallinn’s Pirita/Kloostrimetsa old valley; aligns with preferred formats (guided nature walks, daytime scenic outing).

title: Viru Bog Study Trail (Lahemaa National Park)

operatingHours.summary: Open 24/7 year-round; daylight hours recommended in winter; RMK parking and trail access always open unless posted weather closures.

venue.name: Viru raba õpperada (trailhead parking)
venue.address: Viru bog trailhead parking, Kolga area, Lahemaa National Park, Harju County, Estonia

uniquenessReason: Classic Estonian raised-bog landscape with a viewing tower—signature North-Estonian peat bog scenery not found in most of Europe.
interestFit: Direct hit on nature-scenic formats: self-guided day hike, sunrise/sunset over bog pools; frost/ice make winter scenes dramatic.

sources.note: RMK official trail info (map, access, tips)

title: Jägala Waterfall (Jägala juga)

operatingHours.summary: Open 24/7 year-round; access paths can be icy in winter—use traction.

venue.name: Jägala Waterfall viewpoint
venue.address: Jägala juga, Jõesuu, Harju County, Estonia

uniquenessReason: Estonia’s widest natural waterfall; in cold spells forms striking frozen cascades—distinct seasonal phenomenon near Tallinn.
interestFit: Short nature stop pairing with coastal or bog scenery; dramatic winter aesthetics for photography at low sun.

sources.note: National tourism listing with access details

title: Pakri Cliffs and Coast (Paldiski)

operatingHours.summary: Open 24/7 coastline access; exercise caution near cliff edges, especially with ice/snow.

venue.name: Pakri Klint viewpoints (near lighthouse)
venue.address: Pakri pank (cliffs), Paldiski, Harju County, Estonia

uniquenessReason: Part of the Baltic Klint—sheer limestone sea cliffs unique to the Eastern Baltic, with lighthouse panoramas and stormy winter seascapes.
interestFit: Strong nature-scenic coastal vistas; sunset sessions over the Gulf of Finland offer expansive, dramatic views.

sources.note: National tourism listing with site overview and access
